name: Youku.loadwithnoad
body:
![Youku.loadWithNoad](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/qddegtya/Youku.loadWithNoad/master/noad.jpg)

### About
As you know......

### Download

```
git clone https://github.com/qddegtya/Youku.loadWithNoad.git
```

### Start Server 

```
cd Youku.loadWithNoad && python -m SimpleHTTPServer 8011
```

### Install chrome extension

Open Url:

```
chrome://extensions/
```

Drag Youku.loadWithNoad.crx to your chrome
Enjoy!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
